question: Which edition of the Pune International Film Festival is to be held in January 2020?
explanation: Week-long extravaganza, set to kick off on January 9,2019 will celebrate the diamond jubilee of the formation of the State. Coinciding with the diamond jubilee of the formation of Maharashtra, the films to be screened at the 18th edition of the Pune International Film Festival (PIFF) will showcase the Stateâ€™s heritage and cultural values, eminent filmmaker.
